mapper.insert: insert into india_llpin (id, enterprise_id, llpin, llp_name, number_of_partners, number_of_designated_partners, roc_code, date_of_incorporation, registrated_address, email_id, previous_firm, total_obligation_of_contribution, main_division_of_business, description_of_main_division, statement_date, annual_date, llp_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llpin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberOfPartners,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberOfDesignatedPartners,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateOfIncorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registratedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previousFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalObligationOfContribution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainDivisionOfBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptionOfMainDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statementDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update india_llpin
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
llpin = #{llpin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
llp_name = #{llpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number_of_partners = #{numberOfPartners,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number_of_designated_partners = #{numberOfDesignatedPartners,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roc_code = #{rocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_of_incorporation = #{dateOfIncorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registrated_address = #{registratedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_id = #{emailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previous_firm = #{previousFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_obligation_of_contribution = #{totalObligationOfContribution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_division_of_business = #{mainDivisionOfBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description_of_main_division = #{descriptionOfMainDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
statement_date = #{statementDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
annual_date = #{annualDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
llp_status = #{llpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update india_llpin set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, llpin = #{llpin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, llp_name = #{llpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number_of_partners = #{numberOfPartners,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number_of_designated_partners = #{numberOfDesignatedPartners,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roc_code = #{rocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_of_incorporation = #{dateOfIncorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registrated_address = #{registratedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_id = #{emailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, previous_firm = #{previousFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_obligation_of_contribution = #{totalObligationOfContribution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_division_of_business = #{mainDivisionOfBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_of_main_division = #{descriptionOfMainDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statement_date = #{statementDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, annual_date = #{annualDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, llp_status = #{llpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT 200 code, india_llpin.id llpin_id, india_llpin.enterprise_id llpin_enterprise_id, india_llpin.llpin llpin_llpin, india_llpin.llp_name llpin_llp_name, india_llpin.number_of_partners llpin_number_of_partners, india_llpin.number_of_designated_partners llpin_number_of_designated_partners, india_llpin.roc_code llpin_roc_code, india_llpin.date_of_incorporation llpin_date_of_incorporation, india_llpin.registrated_address llpin_registrated_address, india_llpin.email_id llpin_email_id, india_llpin.previous_firm llpin_previous_firm, india_llpin.total_obligation_of_contribution llpin_total_obligation_of_contribution, india_llpin.main_division_of_business llpin_main_division_of_business, india_llpin.description_of_main_division llpin_description_of_main_division, india_llpin.statement_date llpin_statement_date, india_llpin.annual_date llpin_annual_date, india_llpin.llp_status llpin_llp_status, india_charge.id charge_id, india_charge.enterprise_id charge_enterprise_id, india_charge.srn charge_srn, india_charge.charge_id charge_charge_id, india_charge.charge_holder_name charge_charge_holder_name, india_charge.date_of_creation charge_date_of_creation, india_charge.date_of_modification charge_date_of_modification, india_charge.date_of_satisfaction charge_date_of_satisfaction, india_charge.amount charge_amount, india_charge.address charge_address, india_signatory.id signatory_id, india_signatory.enterprise_id signatory_enterprise_id, india_signatory.din_pan signatory_din_pan, india_signatory.`name` signatory_name, india_signatory.begin_date signatory_begin_date, india_signatory.end_date signatory_end_date, india_signatory.surrendered_din signatory_surrendered_din FROM india_llpin LEFT JOIN india_charge ON india_llpin.enterprise_id = india_charge.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN india_signatory ON india_llpin.enterprise_id = india_signatory.enterprise_id WHERE india_llpin.`status` = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} AND india_llpin.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
